name: QuarantinE - Y.A.P.C.
description:
What is QuarantinE?

QuarantinE - Y.A.P.C. (Yes, Another Pacman Clone) is a Pacman style game made with GDevelop themed around the quarantine that has taken place in many of our countries due to the current pandemic.

Your goal is to avoid the C-moles until you pick up a Power Up like washing your hands, using a sanitizer, wearing a mask or staying home... At that point, the C-moles will turn blue for a limited time (shown as a bar on the top right of the screen) and you can hunt them.

There are also two bonus tokens on each level that can be either Bronze, Silver or Golden. Eating these will also allow you to hunt the C-moles while additionally giving you extra hunting time and extra speed.

How long will you last in QuarantinE?

Controls:

  • Use the Arrow Keys to move Q-man
  • Press <P> during play to pause the game and see the options menu
